QuestData.Title: The Challenger's Ring: Snow Blossom
QuestData.Description: News of your feats has been traveling around the camp, $n.$B$BIn fact, Snow Blossom would like to test your skill in battle.$B$BYou had best prepare yourself, $c. She is not easily defeated.$B$BIf you can prove your worth to her, you will win a valuable friend.
QuestData.LogDescription: Challenge Snow Blossom and defeat her in the Challenger's Ring.
